projects.name: Random Quote Generator
projects.description: This project is a simple app that displays random famous quotes each time a button is clicked. The app is built using basic JavaScript syntax, variables, loops, conditionals, and object literals.

projects.name: Pagination
projects.description: This project aims to enhance the usability of a web page that displays too much information all at once. The problem of long lists making for a poor user experience is solved using a popular web development technique called pagination.

projects.name: Interactive Form
projects.description: This project enhances an interactive registration form for a fictional conference called FullStack Conf using JavaScript. The project uses the supplied HTML and CSS files, and adds customised and conditional behavior and interactivity to make the form more user-friendly.

projects.name: Object Oriented Game
projects.description: This project involves creating a browser-based word guessing game called Phrase Hunter using JavaScript and OOP.

projects.name: Public API Requests
projects.description: This project demonstrates how to build an app using the Random User Generator API to grab information for 12 random employees, and use that data to build a prototype for an Awesome Startup employee directory.

projects.name: Static Node and Express Web App
projects.description: This static web app is a portfolio site built to showcase a few small projects developed with javascript. The web app includes a landing page, an about page with contact information, and details about the developer.
